doc.field: Weatherly Stephan
Weatherly Stephan
Brooklyn street scenes glass plate negatives
Brooklyn street scenes glass plate negatives

Images in the collection show street scenes of residential and domestic life in late 19th century Brooklyn. Brownstones and cobblestone streets with horse-drawn carriages and streetcars are featured prominently.

Images in the collection show street scenes of residential and domestic life in late 19th century Brooklyn. Brownstones and cobblestone streets with horse-drawn carriages and streetcars are featured prominently.
circa 1875 to 1900

The Brooklyn street scenes glass plate negatives dates from circa 1875 to 1899 and contains 16 items. Images in the collection show street scenes of residential and domestic life in late 19th century Brooklyn. Brownstones and cobblestone streets with horse-drawn carriages and streetcars are featured prominently. Two images of Manhattan and Troy, N.Y. are also included in the collection.
Source and date of acquisition are unknown. This collection was accessioned in 1974.
